sentences.en: How can he chastise me for something he knows nothing about?
sentences.cn: 他对事情不了解,怎么能责怪我 呢 !

sentences.en: I just don't want you to chastise yourself.
sentences.cn: 我只是不想要你过于自责。

sentences.en: If any of his disciples were jealous or obstructive , the Master would sternly chastise them.
sentences.cn: 若是弟子中有嫉妒障碍的情事, 上人也必定严厉地予以斥责、训勉.

sentences.en: Inner Focus: Chastise now benefits from Inner Focus. In addition, Starshards no longer consumes Inner Focus.
sentences.cn: 心灵专注: 消耗心灵专注现在可以施放责罚. 另外, 星辰碎片不再消耗心灵专注.

sentences.en: The revolters have gone deep in depravity, But I will chastise all of them.
sentences.cn: 何5:2这些悖逆的人 、 肆行杀戮、罪孽极深.我却斥责他们众人.

sentences.en: Thomas Rane chastised Peters for his cruelty.
sentences.cn: 托马斯·瑞训斥了彼得斯的残忍。
可以批评他.我们不是给予批评的主人.
